title: woom powers UP e-bikes for kids with Fazua Evation equipped UP5 & UP6 e-MTBs
content:
It seems like the debate over e-bikes has cooled down a bit lately. So here to throw some new fuel on the fire is woom with their first e-bikes for kids! Other companies have already electrified select kids’ bikes, but woom thought it could be done better, with less weight. The result is the woom […]

The post woom powers UP e-bikes for kids with Fazua Evation equipped UP5 & UP6 e-MTBs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
